children.text: Are you sure you want to delete this interaction?

children.onClick: {{DeleteInteraction.run(() =>  {closeModal('ConfirmDeleteInteraction');				ShowInteractions.run();}, () => showAlert('Interaction could not be deleted','error'))}}
{{EditInteraction.run(() => { closeModal('EditInteractionModal'); ShowInteractions.run();}, () => showAlert('Unable to save edits','error'))}}
{{AddInteraction.run(() => { closeModal('AddInteractionModal'); ShowInteractions.run();}, () => showAlert('Unable to save interaction','error'))}}
